snippet.title: Boiling Bolt - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on PC/PS4/XBOXOne on December 05, 2017.
Get it on :
*** Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/462250/Boiling_Bolt/
*** XBOXOne - https://www.microsoft.com/store/p/Boiling-Bolt/C5D97L34VG3L

Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics. Help June to save the world alone or with a friend.

Follow us on :
*** Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/BoilingBolt
*** Twitter - https://twitter.com/BoilingBolt
*** IndieDB : http://www.indiedb.com/games/boilingbolt
And don't hesitate to subscribe to our channel to receive latest video update ;)
